author: PlayStation
description:
Innovation powered by you in every mode. The Club is Yours in FC 26, launching September 26. Pre-order now: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP0006-PPSA27360_00-26STANDARDBUNDLE

Play your way with an overhauled gameplay experience, Manager Live Challenges that bring fresh storylines to the new season, and Archetypes inspired by greats of the game. 

Pre-order EA SPORTS FC 26™ Ultimate Edition by August 26 to receive:
An untradeable ICON Player Item at launch. 
Automatic upgrade to a Champion ICON later in the season.

EA SPORTS FC 25™ players will also receive:
An exclusive EVO that boosts any player’s shooting to 99.
Pick 1 of 5 untradeable ICON players rated 93+ from previous campaigns including Grassroot Greats, FUT Birthday, Dreamchasers & FUT Immortals in EA SPORTS FC™ 25. 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #easports #easportsfc26
title: EA Sports FC 26 - Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014325

Labyrinthine – Console Edition, the first-person co-op horror game, launches September 18, 2025, on #PlayStation5. 
Labyrinthine offers a journey into the realm of nightmares, with an emphasis on exploration, puzzle-solving, and atmospheric storytelling. 

•        Co-operative online multiplayer for up to 8 players and single-player.
•        Use in-game voice chat to coordinate actions with the team.
•        Story Mode: uncover the haunting history of the maze in 6 chapters.
•        Case Files Mode: procedurally generated mazes ensure endless replayability.
•        Face over 30+ unique monsters, each with unique mechanics and styles. 
•        Unlock over 200 cosmetics to personalize characters and gear
•        Progress through a leveling system that unlocks 19 distinct maze types 

#ps5 #ps5games 

Rated Mature
title: Labyrinthine Console Edition - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008217

11 Facts About The Alters: A Journey Beyond Survival

At first glance, The Alters is a sci-fi survival game about managing resources and escaping a hostile planet. But beneath the surface, it’s a deeply personal story about identity, consequence, and the versions of ourselves we never got to become.

In this new trailer, actor Alex Jordan - who voices every version of protagonist Jan Dolski with undoubted flair  - guides viewers through 11 essential facts about the game. Each is delivered by a different Alter, shedding light on their unique perspective and the game’s multifaceted gameplay.
From the deadly advance of a radioactive sun to the emotional toll of commanding your own alternate selves, The Alters blends mechanics and meaning in a way that invites players to not only survive - but reflect.

Whether you're new to the game or already exploring its depths, this quick tour reveals just how much more lies beneath the surface of
title: The Alters - 11 Facts Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011468/

What makes Castor Woods the go-to vacation spot this summer? Find out with our official tour rep, Bober the Beaver!

Filmed all by himself, Bober will show you around and detail just a small part of what you can get up to when you visit the valley in Dying Light: The Beast.

Are you ready to join him and unleash the beast on August 22?

#ps5 #ps5games #dyinglight 

Rated Mature
title: Dying Light: The Beast - Visit Castor Woods with Bober the Beaver | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/shadow-labyrinth/

The wait is over. Shadow Labyrinth, the 2D action platformer and genre-twisting alternate take on the iconic PAC-MAN has finally arrived. Awaken as Swordsman No.8 and team up with PUCK to explore a vast and mysterious planet, do battle with evolved monstrosities, and devour all who oppose you. Don’t fear the darkness, consume it.

#ps5 #ps5games #ShadowLabyrinth #ConsumeDarkness #pacman
title: Shadow Labyrinth - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

Particle Hearts comes to PlayStation 5 on August 25th, 2025! 

Explore a world made entirely of particles. Use special abilities to manipulate those particles, solve puzzles, avoid detection, and uncover the role you play in this sinister and beautiful land.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Particle Hearts - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10015528

Restore balance to the world of KAKU: Ancient Seal, available on October 17th on PlayStation 5!

Explore a vast open world as the young Kaku in this thrilling action RPG. With your trusty companion Piggy by your side, harness the divine power of the Creator Saga to solve puzzles and fight powerful enemies in order to save the world from destruction.

#ps5 #ps5games #kakuancientseal
title: KAKU: Ancient Seal - Console Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games
